title: How can i use my skin code to redeem the free skin?
body: i have just got a free skin code and i don't know where should i put it to get my skin , any help please?

replies.body: You can redeem content with codes through the in-game store page.  In the purchase RP section, there will be an option to redeem codes.  If you have any issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team will be happy to help!
